mapper.update: update sms_record set txnId = #{txnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smsType = #{smsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, smsSource = #{smsSource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, smsStatus = #{smsStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, receiveMobiles = #{receiveMobiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smsParam = #{smsParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smsTemplateCode = #{smsTemplateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
